channel.title: Internet Society Events
channel.description: Latest events to get involved with Internet Society initiatives

item.title: 5e édition du Forum national sur le DNS de l’Antic
item.description: This seminar aims to build the capacity of the personnel in charge of critical infrastructure and to further optimize the quality of services. The direct impact of this forum will be the improvement of the Internet connection in Cameroon and the enhancement of Internet security. The direct output of this seminar is the resolution of numerous Internet connection problems in Cameroon."
